Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires the release of individuals from utility corporation services in instances of domestic violence
Summary: Requires the release of individuals from utility corporation services in instances of domestic violence where such individuals request to opt-out in writing and provide certain documents to the utility corporation.
LawCode: Add ยง48-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring the release of individuals from utility corporation services in instances of domestic violence
